OgreView Class Reference

#include <ogreview.h>

Collaboration diagram for OgreView:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A Ogre3D renderer embedded in a QWidget.

This code is based on the Quentin Bereau's Show Mesh

Definition at line 48 of file ogreview.h.

Definition at line 585 of file ogreview.cpp.

void OgreView::selectObject ( QMouseEvent *  evt  )  [protected]

Called if a mouse click is done.

It uses Ogre RaySceneQuery and camera getCameraToViewportRay to know if we click on an Ogre Entity.

Parameters:
evt The Qt mouse event
